channel.title: Better make of pc?
channel.description:
Hello,
What is an overall better make: hp, or medion?
Thanks.

item.title: Better make of pc?
item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

[quote=“Exception_, post:18, topic:255957”][quote author=Mopman link=topic=338154.msg2626354#msg2626354 date=1231802966]
He’s right though, build it yourself. The hardest part is choosing components, and I’m sure if you post a budget/what you want to do with it, someone here will tell you exactly what to buy.
[/quote]

It’s simple when you know, and you can all say how easy it is to build a computer but most people think of their computer in the same way as their microwave, or playstation. They have vague idea of how it works, but to them it’s a magical box with bits of random cables inside it. Which is why HP/Medion formed, because the world’s retarded.[/quote]

I know how computers and all work and how to make them, I just wouldn’t go fucking around with the microwave though. That is dodgy (Could kill my children.)

Read full topic

Save yourself a lot of money.

Yeh thats what i do, but this is my mates pc and he wanted to know.

You know you can just tell sanga282 to fuck off and it’s for your self you pussy[/quote]

item.title: Better make of pc?
item.dc:creator: @Exception1 Exception_
item.description:
@Exception1 wrote:

Mopman:

He’s right though, build it yourself. The hardest part is choosing components, and I’m sure if you post a budget/what you want to do with it, someone here will tell you exactly what to buy.

It’s simple when you know, and you can all say how easy it is to build a computer but most people think of their computer in the same way as their microwave, or playstation. They have vague idea of how it works, but to them it’s a magical box with bits of random cables inside it. Which is why HP/Medion formed, because the world’s retarded.

Read full topic

item.title: Better make of pc?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I james I:

What could I get for £550??

You could build yourself a very nice computer, or buy a prebuilt POS. What do you want to do with the computer?

item.title: Better make of pc?
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

[quote=“R.I.P RSC, post:14, topic:255957”]I don’t think the brand matters, other then the service/guarantee you receive. They all buy parts and assemble them, so you should look at the parts they use instead. While your at it, you might as well buy those parts and assemble it yourself.

Or am I wrong, and does Dell/Medion/Compaq add a special ingredient?[/quote]

It’s love, the special ingredient is love. Or ridiculous bloatware.

Read full topic

item.title: Better make of pc?
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

I don’t think the brand matters, other then the service/guarantee you receive. They all buy parts and assemble them, so you should look at the parts they use instead. While your at it, you might as well buy those parts and assemble it yourself.

Or am I wrong, and does Dell/Medion/Compaq add a special ingredient?

Read full topic
